ad_block_detected.title: Adblock Enabled
ad_block_detected.text: Adblock(or anything that prevents loading the resources) is working. Misskey doesn't show ads, but you may not use some of the functions(following users, etc.). To use Misskey pleasantly, disable Adblock.

confirmation_dialog.title: Are you sure?
confirmation_dialog.text: Do you really want to delete all nofications?

re_confirmation_dialog.title: Really?
re_confirmation_dialog.text: There are some unread nofications. Are you sure you want delete all notifications?

post.repost_form_title: Do you want to repost this status?

settings.display_user_name_in_post: Show the user's name in the posts
settings.display_user_screen_name_in_post: Show the user's ID in the posts
settings.display_created_at_in_post: Show when created the post in the posts
settings.display_actions_in_post: Show the actions in the posts
settings.enable_url_preview_in_post: Enable URL preview in a post
settings.thumbnailyze_attached_image_of_post: Show the thumbnail image insted of the raw image
settings.enable_notification_sound_when_receiving: Enable the notification sound when receiving a new post
